product_name: MOON Take a Hike: Seattle - 3rd Edition
long_description: Escape from Pugetropolis and immerse yourself in the natural beauty of the Pacific Northwest. MOON Take a Hike: Seattle offer 75 hikes within a 2-hour drive of downtown Seattle.
short_description: Escape from Pugetropolis and immerse yourself in the natural beauty of the Pacific Northwest. MOON Take a Hike: Seattle offer 75 hikes within a 2-hour drive of downtown Seattle.
